name: Blue + Red (Duncan Sparks)
description:
The jam version of this game can be found here.

Defeating an evil demon lord for extra credit? Pretty typical day for a sorcery student. Being cursed by said demon lord to sporadically transform into a feral demon? Slightly more of an inconvenience.

Explore Lord Osme's dungeon and fight his cohorts, sometimes as a human and sometimes as a demon. You'll move with the keyboard as a human and the mouse as a demon, and you'll need to adapt to these swapping control schemes and ration your time between each change.

This game was made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2020, under the theme "Out of Control."
